## About
I am Mohit Maheshwari (aka 0xmohit / 0xmoh1t), a blockchain and full-stack developer with hands-on experience in Solidity, dApps, Web3 & Web2 integrations, and AI in crypto projects. I focus on turning ideas into functional products with smart contracts, web applications, and interactive platforms. I also create content, manage communities, and organize tech events to support growth and adoption in Web3 ecosystems.

## Skills
- **Blockchain & Web3:** Solidity, Hardhat, Foundry, Ethers.js, Web3 Wallets (Metamask)
- **Web Development:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- **AI & Automation:** AI agent development, intelligent tools for productivity
- **Roles / Expertise:** Full Stack Developer, dApp Developer, NFT & Marketplace Developer, Smart Contract Developer, AI x Crypto Enthusiast

## Projects
1. **SEIFun** – No-code token launch platform on Sei blockchain. Users can instantly create and trade tokens. [GitHub](https://github.com/0xmoh1t/SeiFun)  
2. **0xDeVotes** – Decentralized voting platform for secure, transparent on-chain governance. [GitHub](https://github.com/0xmoh1t/LNMHacks7.0)  
3. **Notesea** – Telegram Mini App enhancing user interaction and platform reach. [Live Demo](https://notenests.netlify.app/)  
4. **AI Resume Builder** – Intelligent agent generating professional, ATS-friendly resumes. [GitHub](https://github.com/0xmoh1t/AI-Resume-Builder)  
5. **Joke Extension** – Fun browser add-on delivering witty jokes during browsing. [GitHub](https://github.com/0xmoh1t/Daddy-Joke-Extension)
